# AVSpeechSynthesizer.PersonalVoiceAuthorizationStatus.unsupported

**Case**

The device doesn’t support personal voices.

## Declaration

```swift
case unsupported
```

## Authorization statuses

- **AVSpeechSynthesizer.PersonalVoiceAuthorizationStatus.authorized**: The user granted your app’s request to use personal voices.
- **AVSpeechSynthesizer.PersonalVoiceAuthorizationStatus.denied**: The user denied your app’s request to use personal voices.
- **AVSpeechSynthesizer.PersonalVoiceAuthorizationStatus.notDetermined**: The app hasn’t requested authorization to use personal voices.
